Posts.Content: Hi Midway Girl and Bev, I thank you so much for your posts they give me hope! Wendi
Posts.Title: STAGE 4 BREAST CE TO BONE

Posts.Content:
Hi 
Any more people with cancer that met to bones with success? Wendi
Posts.Title: STAGE 4 BREAST CE TO BONE

Posts.Content: I just read your post. Thank you for the hope. My doc just found 2 bone met. I didnt expect this . i am scared and i am looking for stories of survival and hope. Thank you Wendi
Posts.Title: STAGE 4 BREAST CE TO BONE

Posts.Content:
Hi Bev,
Thank you so much for your post. I am 51. I still have young kids. 
about
 your friend, after the radiation to her bones was she able to walk? Was it the radiation alone that stopped the cancer?
 I watched that movie. It is on Netflix. very inspiring. There is also Crazy Sexy Cancer for anyone out there looking for a wholistic approach.
I get an MRI tuesday. I get results on wednesday. Sometimes I am hopeful and sometimes I am just scared crap!
I have a friend in a study in NY. they are having great results. I am going to try to get into the study. I expect to know by week end. Thanks for all of your support. Wendi
Posts.Title: STAGE 4 BREAST CE TO BONE

Posts.Content: Hi, I had a mastectomy 2 years ago with 23 lymoh removed. I went in monday because I had some pain in my back. I didnt expect the news that i received. 2 sites that it is in the bones. I am going to get an MRI to make sure and i am going to start on tamoxafin. I am really scared. I was into wheatgrass and raw foods but I cheated a lot in the 2 years. My doctor thinks there is hope and I don't know what to think. It is really hard to sleep.
Posts.Title: breast cancer to bone

Posts.Content: I have breast cancer with mets to the bnes. Is there anyone that knows of a good out come for this? Wendi
Posts.Title: (No Subject)

Posts.Content:
Hi Ladies,
Thank you so much for your posts. I was diagnosed on Tuesday. I felt only sad and afraid since then. This morning I was OK for a while and when I read your posts it kept me thinking in a positive direction. thank you so much. 
By the way, fresh vegatable juice has a lot of minerals and vitamines in it and they are easily adsorbed by the body.
And I don't know how to spell tamaxofin either. Thank you for your prayers I will be praying fo ryou too.
XXOO Wendi
Posts.Title: STAGE 4 BREAST CE TO BONE

Posts.Content:
Hi DMO,
I appreciate your post. I am feeling a little hopeful today. I walked and juiced a lot today. Thank you for your prayers! I will get an MRI next week and see whats really up. After that I will start Taxaxofin. what stage were you at when you started the tamoxafin? Wendi
